resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75881</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75881</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>e59e430d-8413-4b67-91e1-e5b7e2b28c12#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A periódusos rendszer részei</string>
            <string language="en">Parts of the periodic table of elements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teile der periodischen Tabelle der Elemente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parties de la table périodique des éléments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partes da tabela periódica dos elementos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parti della tabella periodica degli elementi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη του περιοδικού πίνακα των στοιχείων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Partes del vector periódico de elementos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A periódusos rendszer különböző szempontok szerint beszíneződő területekkel</string>
            <string language="en">The periodic table of elements with tinging area according to different point of view</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">s-mező,  p-mező,  d-mezp,  f-mező,  </string>
            <string language="en">s-area, p-area, d-area, f-area</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die periodische Tabelle der Elemente mit 
tönendem Bereich entsprechend unterschiedlichem Gesichtspunkt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La table périodique des éléments avec la zone 
de coloration selon le point de vue différent</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tabela periódica dos elementos com área 
tinging de acordo com o ponto diferente da vista</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La tabella periodica degli elementi con zona di 
tintura secondo il punto di vista differente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο περιοδικός πίνακας των στοιχείων με την απόχρωση της
περιοχής σύμφωνα με τη διαφορετική άποψη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El vector periódico de elementos con área de 
coloración según diverso punto de vista</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sbereich, Pbereich, Dbereich, Fbereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">s-zone, p-zone, d-zone, f-zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">s-área, p-área, d-área, f-área</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">s-zona, p-zona, d-zona, f-zona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">s-perjohi', π-περιοχή, δ-περιοχή, φ-περιοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">s-a'rea, p-a'rea, d-a'rea, f-a'rea</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75881</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=e59e430d-8413-4b67-91e1-e5b7e2b28c12&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
